html: House Dems picked up 40 seats last November. Our candidates didn’t run on collusion or impeachment. We promised to lower healthcare costs #ForThePeople. And that’s exactly what we are doing. FACTS.
text:
House Dems picked up 40 seats last November.

Our candidates didn’t run on collusion or impeachment.

We promised to lower healthcare costs #ForThePeople.

And that’s exactly what we are doing.

FACTS.
